item.description:
On Saturday April 6th My City Gardens and Growing For Good are teaming up and installing raised gardening beds in yards across Cambridge and Somerville. All beds are constructed from nontoxic durable pine, filled with local organic approved compost and will be fully installed that day. Prices range from $399-$599 depending on desired size and irrigation. For details and to sign up to receive a bed go to http://mycitygardens.weebly.com

note: last day to sign up for a bed is March 23rd.

About us and the event:
MyCityGardens.com connects Greater Boston Area landholders who are willing to share their outdoor spaces with neighbors who want to roll up their sleeves and start planting. Check out our site to start yard sharing! It's never too early to find a gardening partner. After launching last spring we noticed that one of the largest barriers to yard sharing and urban gardening in general is creating a gardening space. So we're holding this 'spree' on April 6th to get beds built at a low price.
item.name: Raised Bed Spree & Yard Sharing
